column4: hello everyone ..tehcnical question here... I am trying to install a ubuntu ocelot on my macbook pro 8.1 but i keep getting messages that initramfs could not find a live image.. However i tried with an older image of crunchbang (I386) and that one can boot to live desktop.. however whenever i try with an oneiric-desktop-amd64+mac.iso no luck.. Any ideas? on the website is says it is mac compatible .. I have an intel p
actually that was not what I meant at all
it uses partman, which comes with the debian installer
